content.title: Antes que o Diabo Saiba que Você Está Morto
content.stars: Philip Seymour Hoffman, Ethan Hawke, Albert Finney
content.description: When two brothers organize the robbery of their parents' jewelry store the job goes horribly wrong, triggering a series of events that sends them, their father and one brother's wife hurtling towards a shattering climax.
